translation.en: -[dog whimpering] -[Michelle] Doug.
translation.zh: 道格

translation.en: Foxtrot November Bravo, this is Lofton Homestead. Please come in.
translation.zh: FNB 这里是洛夫顿家园 请回话

translation.en: Fullerton Airways, this is Foxtrot November Bravo.
translation.zh: 富勒顿航空公司 这里是FNB

translation.en: Mail drop complete. Heading back to base.
translation.zh: 邮件投递已完成 正在返回基地

translation.en: [Jeff on radio] Roger that. Get a wiggle on.
translation.zh: 收到 加快速度

translation.en: Your next tour group's already been waiting 20 minutes.
translation.zh: 你的下一个旅行团已经在这里了他们已经等20分钟了

translation.en: Yeah, copy that. I'm on my way.
translation.zh: 好吧 收到 我在路上了

translation.en: [Michelle] …Bravo, this is Lofton Homestead. Please come in.
translation.zh: …B 这里是洛夫顿家园 请回话

translation.en: Lofton Homestead, I'm reading you loud and clear. What's wrong?
translation.zh: 洛夫顿家园我能很清楚地听到你的声音 -出什么事了？-我们家的老狗被蛇咬了

translation.en: Doug's been bitten by a snake, and he's fading.
translation.zh: -出什么事了？-我们家的老狗被蛇咬了 它正在失去意识我们需要尽快带它去看贾斯特曼医生

translation.en: We need to see Dr. Justman ASAP. Can you help us out?
translation.zh: 它正在失去意识我们需要尽快带它去看贾斯特曼医生 你能帮帮我们吗？

translation.en: No worries, Michelle, I'll be there in 20.
translation.zh: 别担心 米歇尔 我20分钟后到

translation.en: -You just get him ready to go. -We'll see you soon. Out.
translation.zh: -你只需要让它做好转移的准备-待会儿见 完毕

translation.en: -[Dana] Fullerton Airways, do you read? -[Jeff] Go ahead.
translation.zh: -你只需要让它做好转移的准备-待会儿见 完毕 呼叫富勒顿航空公司

translation.en: [Dana] Call Dr. Justman.
translation.zh: -请讲-打给贾斯特曼医生

translation.en: -I'm bringing Doug to see him. -[Jeff] What?
translation.zh: -我要带道格去见他-什么？

translation.en: We have paying clients twiddling their thumbs here.
translation.zh: 我们这里的付费游客都等得无聊了

translation.en: [Dana] It's an emergency. Snakebite.
translation.zh: 这是紧急情况 被蛇咬了

translation.en: [Jeff] Snakebite… Do you even have enough fuel to get there?
translation.zh: 被蛇咬伤？你有足够的燃料飞去那里吗？

translation.en: I'll make it.
translation.zh: 我能飞过去

translation.en: [sighs] Hi, Dana. Thank God you were around. Strap in.
translation.zh: -嗨 戴娜 谢天谢地你在附近-系好安全带

translation.en: [Jeff] Eh, what am I gonna do with that girl?
translation.zh: 我该拿这个姑娘怎么办？

translation.en: [Dana] Valve sounded good up there, Nik.
translation.zh: 排气阀在天上听起来没毛病 尼基

translation.en: Yeah, you better hope it does. Cost enough. Bloody rip off.
translation.zh: 嘿 盼着没毛病就对了毕竟花了很多钱 简直就是讹诈

translation.en: [Jeff] What would you do if you didn't have our customers
translation.zh: 迈克 如果飞机上没有乘客供你戏弄那你该怎么办？

translation.en: -to pinch, ey, Mike? -[Mike] Keep 'em coming, Jeff.
translation.zh: 迈克 如果飞机上没有乘客供你戏弄那你该怎么办？ 杰夫 接着调侃我吧

translation.en: You trying to send me to an early grave?
translation.zh: 你是想害我早早丧命吗？

translation.en: You look pretty good to me. Have you been exercising?
translation.zh: 你是想害我早早丧命吗？ 你看起来体型怪不错的最近健身了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, actually… Stop changing the subject.
translation.zh: 是的 其实…别偷换主题

translation.en: You've got to stop putting remote air support over paying clients.
translation.zh: 你不能再只顾忙着远程空中支援而忽视我们的付费客户了

translation.en: [Nikki] Wait, did we just lose another flight?
translation.zh: 等等 我们又少飞了一趟航班？

translation.en: -[Dana] I had to help. It's Doug. -We're stretched thin here.
translation.zh: 我不帮不行 是道格 我们这儿都快应付不来了

translation.en: We've been stretched thin before.
translation.zh: -以前我们就曾经应付不过来-但没这次严重

translation.en: Not this thin. Price of parts is always rising.
translation.zh: -以前我们就曾经应付不过来-但没这次严重 零件价格总是在上涨

translation.en: Every time we make a mail delivery or supply food or medicine
translation.zh: 每当人们让我投递邮件供应食物、药品

translation.en: or fly Doug to Dr. Justman,
translation.zh: 或者载着道格去见贾斯特曼医生时

translation.en: that's a potential paying tourist flight that doesn't happen.
translation.zh: 都意味着一趟潜在的付费游客航班就此泡汤

translation.en: Kills me to say it, but if we're gonna stay in the air,
translation.zh: 有句话我不该说但要想立足于航空行业

translation.en: we're gonna have to focus on profit.
translation.zh: 我们应该聚焦于盈利

translation.en: Dad, remote air support is the reason Mom started Fullerton Airways.
translation.zh: 爸 远程空中支援可是妈成立富勒顿航空公司的初衷啊

translation.en: That was the whole point.
translation.zh: 这才是核心要义

translation.en: [hesitates] I know, Dana, but--
translation.zh: -我知道 戴娜 但是…-情况会好转的

translation.en: Things will pick up. We just got to book more charter to it,
translation.zh: -我知道 戴娜 但是…-情况会好转的 我们只需要拿到更多的包机订单或者开始飞夜间航班

translation.en: so I'll start running night flights.
translation.zh: 我们只需要拿到更多的包机订单或者开始飞夜间航班

translation.en: [Jeff] You can't stay in the air 24/7, Dana.
translation.zh: 戴娜 你不能7天24小时都待在空中

translation.en: You've gotta take some time for yourself.
translation.zh: 你必须给自己留一些时间

translation.en: -Don't make me say it. -Dana, I'm serious.
translation.zh: -别逼我说出来-戴娜 我是认真的

translation.en: -Like Mom always said… -Sweety.
translation.zh: -就像妈以前常说的…-亲爱的

translation.en: …"If you want something done, you've got to do it yourself."
translation.zh: “自己动手 丰衣足食”

translation.en: -Let me hear it. -Do it yourself.
translation.zh: -大声说给我听-自己动手

translation.en: Do it yourself.
translation.zh: 自己动手

translation.en: If you need me, I'll be doing ground checks.
translation.zh: 有需要就喊我 我去做地面检查

translation.en: [Jeff] She's a lot like you, Clara.
translation.zh: 她很像你 克拉拉

translation.en: [William] Fullerton Airways.
translation.zh: （ITCM金融公司） 富勒顿航空公司

translation.en: Their margin has been cratering year on year.
translation.zh: 他们的利润率逐年下降

translation.en: They're not doing well.
translation.zh: 他们业绩不佳

translation.en: No. Nobody says that. "They're not doing well."
translation.zh: 不 没有人这样说话“他们业绩不佳”

translation.en: It's unprofessional. They are… They are…
translation.zh: 这话不专业 他们…

translation.en: bleeding from the throat.
translation.zh: …企业大出血

translation.en: They're bleeding from the throat. That's good. That sounds tough.
translation.zh: 他们的企业在大出血不错 听起来很霸气

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: You got this.
translation.zh: 你没问题的

translation.en: -[William exhales] -We're going around in circles.
translation.zh: 因为我们一点进展都没有

translation.en: Go and tell them to get back to me with a tender offer by noon tomorrow.
translation.zh: 去告诉他们我要在明天中午之前看到要约收购

translation.en: And you tell them that I expect their commitment.
translation.zh: 而且要告诉他们 我期待他们的承诺

translation.en: Come in. Oh, Alex, spare me. I love the deal at 40.
translation.zh: 请进 亚历克斯 饶了我吧 价格40 那就是笔好交易价格50 那简直是在侮辱

translation.en: It's an insult at 50. [mouthing]
translation.zh: 价格40 那就是笔好交易价格50 那简直是在侮辱

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Now I have to go. My son's here.
translation.zh: 我得挂电话了 我儿子来了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -[line disconnects] -William. Hello, Dad. Good to see you.
translation.zh: -威廉-爸 你好 很高兴见到你

translation.en: The board will be convening shortly,
translation.zh: 董事会议马上要开始了所以我只有几分钟时间

translation.en: -so I only have a few minutes. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 董事会议马上要开始了所以我只有几分钟时间 -好的-那么…

translation.en: So, your team leader tells me you're doing good work.
translation.zh: -好的-那么… 你的组长告诉我你做得很出色

translation.en: As I recall, you were always stronger on your humanities than your maths.
translation.zh: 我记得 你的人文学科 总是比数学强

translation.en: I hope she's not just telling me what I want to hear.
translation.zh: 我希望她不是故意挑我爱听的话说

translation.en: I knew it was a good idea to start bribing her.
translation.zh: 我早就知道开始贿赂她是个好主意

translation.en: So then, how goes your little assignment? What have you got for me?
translation.zh: 那么 你的小任务怎么样了？有什么要告诉我的？

translation.en: Oh, um, well, before we get into it, I just… I wanted to say thank you.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 在聊正题之前我就是…我想先谢谢你

translation.en: I'm looking forward to working with you.
translation.zh: 我很期待跟你共事

translation.en: William, I haven't got all day.
translation.zh: 威廉 我时间有限

translation.en: Yeah, right.
translation.zh: 对 好的

translation.en: Right. Um…
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Well, your, um, e-mail said to identify possible areas for consolidation.
translation.zh: 你在邮件里说要找可以整合的资源

translation.en: I did some digging. Um…
translation.zh: 我做了一些调查

translation.en: Fullerton Airways, uh, their margins have been cratering year on year.
translation.zh: 富勒顿航空公司 他们的利润率逐年下降

translation.en: They're bleeding from the throat. But there are salvageable assets.
translation.zh: 他们这家企业在大出血 但也有可挽救的资产

translation.en: Um, aeronautical equipment, planes, real estate,
translation.zh: 航空设备、飞机、房地产

translation.en: which, if we were to pull the trigger and sell,
translation.zh: 如果我们决定售出的话

translation.en: would wipe the debt holdings off our books.
translation.zh: 这些将能够抹去我们账面上的债务

translation.en: I must confess. I am a little surprised.
translation.zh: 不得不承认 我有点惊讶

translation.en: This is strong work.
translation.zh: 这份作业很扎实

translation.en: Take care of it.
translation.zh: 去办吧

translation.en: I don't… What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？

translation.en: Go to Fullerton and take care of it.
translation.zh: 去富勒顿把这件事办了

translation.en: Right. Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Okay, so the thing is, is Fullerton is, um, in Australia.
translation.zh: 好吧 是这样的 富勒顿在澳大利亚

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 没错啊

translation.en: [softly] That's a long flight.
translation.zh: 要飞很久

translation.en: Um, are you sure, though, that I'm the right, you know, person?
translation.zh: 但你确定我是正确的人选吗？

translation.en: Because my temperament, I don't…
translation.zh: 毕竟以我的性格 我不…

translation.en: -Australia's very brash. -Nevertheless, we have to show
translation.zh: 而澳大利亚人又非常傲慢 尽管如此 我们必须证明

translation.en: that we've done our due diligence before selling.
translation.zh: 我们在售出前已经做了尽职调查

translation.en: Inspect the operation, go over their books,
translation.zh: 检查运营情况 翻阅他们的账本

translation.en: cross the T's, dot the I's and then… [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: 小心谨慎 查漏补缺 然后…

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Why me?
translation.zh: 为什么选我？

translation.en: Because… next year, I plan to recommend you
translation.zh: 因为… 明年 我打算推荐你担任初级主管

translation.en: for the position of junior director.
translation.zh: 明年 我打算推荐你担任初级主管

translation.en: It's time. Time for you to take on real responsibility.
translation.zh: 时候到了 你该承担真正的责任了

translation.en: [chuckles] Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: -God, thank you. -Don't thank me yet.
translation.zh: -天啊 谢谢-别着急谢我

translation.en: -Okay. -If…
translation.zh: -好吧-如果…

translation.en: If you're going to take on an executive role in this firm,
translation.zh: 如果你想在这家公司担任高管

translation.en: you have to demonstrate that you can do what's necessary.
translation.zh: 就得证明你有能力采取必要行动

translation.en: -By going to… -Australia.
translation.zh: -通过去…-澳大利亚

translation.en: -Australia. -Correct.
translation.zh: -澳大利亚-没错

translation.en: The board meets again in just over a week.
translation.zh: 一个多星期后 还会召开董事会议

translation.en: I want you to take care of it, then present to them in person.
translation.zh: 我想让你把这件事办好然后在董事会议上当面呈给他们看

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: That's good. Okay.
translation.zh: 这挺好的 好的

translation.en: -William. -Yes. Yeah.
translation.zh: -威廉-在 我在

translation.en: This is important.
translation.zh: 这件事非常重要

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Don't disappoint me.
translation.zh: 别让我失望

translation.en: No. Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 不会的 好的 先生

translation.en: [Nikki] '96 BMW K1100RS.
translation.zh: 1996年款宝马K1100RS

translation.en: -Sick beast. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 马力绝对强劲

translation.en: What's he asking?
translation.zh: 他要多少？

translation.en: -Fifteen grand? -[dart thuds]
translation.zh: 一万五？

translation.en: [in sing-song voice] My turn.
translation.zh: 轮到我了

translation.en: -That was a shocker. -Also you suck.
translation.zh: -你刚才吓到我了-你太逊了

translation.en: -[Heath] Good shot, Nik. -Oi, what would you pay for a '96 BMW K1100RS?
translation.zh: -投得好 尼基-96年的宝马K1100RS 你出多少钱？

translation.en: -How many K's on it? -35,000.
translation.zh: -里程多少？-三万五

translation.en: -Eight grand? -Exactly.
translation.zh: -八千？-这就对了

translation.en: [Heath] You know, uh,
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: Dana used to love hitting up Lang's field on the back of my '97, right?
translation.zh: 戴娜以前喜欢坐我那辆97年的摩托去兰的田地玩耍

translation.en: [chuckles] Um, I think we remember things a little bit differently. -Oh. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 我觉得咱俩的记忆有点偏差

translation.en: Okay. Please get back together.
translation.zh: 好吧 拜托你们和好如初吧

translation.en: -Wouldn't hold your breath. -Please ignore her.
translation.zh: -别抱太大希望-请忽略她

translation.en: She's freakishly obsessed with my love life.
translation.zh: 她疯狂痴迷于想让我谈恋爱

translation.en: Excuse me? What love life?
translation.zh: 抱歉？什么谈恋爱？

translation.en: I just think you need to get out more, okay?
translation.zh: 我只是觉得你需要多出去走走

translation.en: I hate to say it, D, but, um, she's right.
translation.zh: 我不想这么说 戴娜 但她说得对

translation.en: [Nikki] I'm correct.
translation.zh: 我说得对

translation.en: -[scoffs] -What's the problem anyway?
translation.zh: 到底有什么问题？

translation.en: -Dating is fun. -When do I have time to go on dates?
translation.zh: -约会很有趣-我什么时候有时间约会？

translation.en: Yeah, but that's exactly kind of the point right there.
translation.zh: 没错 这就是重点

translation.en: You can't dedicate your entire life to work.
translation.zh: 你不能把一辈子都投入到工作上面

translation.en: Have some Dana time.
translation.zh: 你得有点“戴娜时间”

translation.en: And that's not a euphemism, don't be gross.
translation.zh: 这不是委婉表达你别往恶心的地方去想

translation.en: Love what you do, do what you love, never work a day in your life.
translation.zh: 热爱本职工作 做热爱的事就不算是上班

translation.en: Isn't that what they say, Nikki?
translation.zh: 大家不都这么说吗？

translation.en: Yes, but you don't have to be this nuts about it.
translation.zh: 是的 但你没必要这么鸡血满满的

translation.en: Jeff's, right, you know, maybe it's time we switched gears and…
translation.zh: 杰夫说得对 也许是时候换一种…

translation.en: I don't know, leave saving the day to the big guys.
translation.zh: 我也说不好也许应该把拯救世界留给大人物去做

translation.en: Okay. Would you guys relax? I… I know what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 好吧 你们能放松点吗？ 我…我知道自己在干什么

translation.en: -Is that so? -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 是这样吗？

translation.en: It's Dana's way or no way, huh?
translation.zh: 要么走戴娜的路子 要么无路可走

translation.en: No, it's not my way.
translation.zh: 不 不是我的路子

translation.en: I just want to keep Fullerton Airways the way it's always been.
translation.zh: 我只是想保持富勒顿航空公司一直以来的样子

translation.en: The way Mom made it.
translation.zh: 也就是我妈创建它时的样子

translation.en: I miss her too, you know. We all miss her.
translation.zh: 我也想她 我们大家都想她

translation.en: She was real special. One in a million.
translation.zh: 她真的很特别 万里挑一的那一种

translation.en: I guess in spite, you got to put your feet on the ground sometime.
translation.zh: 我就是有点担心有时候你必须要实际点

translation.en: Otherwise, life will fly right by you.
translation.zh: 否则 生活会从你身边飞逝

translation.en: -Have you been practicing that? -Yes, in the mirror.
translation.zh: -这话你是不是练过？-没错 对着镜子练过

translation.en: It was a pun about flying. It's very clever.
translation.zh: 这是一句关于飞行的双关 很巧妙

translation.en: -All right, I'm out. -All right.
translation.zh: 我要走了

translation.en: But remember, life will fly right by you.
translation.zh: 但要记住 生活会从你身边飞逝

translation.en: Yeah. Wheels office. 8:00.
translation.zh: 好的 八点在车轮车间

translation.en: -All right. Bye-bye. I love you. -Yeah. I love you too.
translation.zh: -好的 再见 爱你-好的 我也爱你

translation.en: Where else would you rather be?
translation.zh: 哪儿能比得上这里啊？

translation.en: -Morning, love. -Morning, Jeff.
translation.zh: -早上好 亲-早上好 杰夫

translation.en: All righty. What's on the docket for today?
translation.zh: 好了 今天的日程是什么？

translation.en: Nikki!
translation.zh: 尼基！

translation.en: -[sighs] Morning, team. -[vacuum whirring]
translation.zh: 早上好 同事们

translation.en: Uh, finally.
translation.zh: 嘿 你终于来了

translation.en: We've had a little surprise shake up here this morning.
translation.zh: 今天早上这里发生了一点小惊喜

translation.en: Oh, by surprise you mean the e-mail you got three days ago?
translation.zh: 你的“惊喜”是指三天前收到的电子邮件吗？

translation.en: Isn't that the one, Jeff?
translation.zh: 是吗 杰夫？

translation.en: I've been a bit behind on the admin.
translation.zh: 好吧 在行政工作上 我稍显落后

translation.en: Seems we're getting an impromptu visit from our friends at ITCM Financial.
translation.zh: 看来ITCM金融公司的朋友们要临时来见我们

translation.en: They're sending someone to do an inspection.
translation.zh: 他们要派一个人来检查

translation.en: Is that normal? I mean, we never hear from those guys.
translation.zh: 这算正常吗？他们从没跟我们联系过

translation.en: Yeah, Jeff, why are they suddenly showing up?
translation.zh: 是啊 杰夫他们为什么会突然出现？

translation.en: Everything's okay, yeah, Dad?
translation.zh: 一切都还正常吧 爸？

translation.en: I'm sure it's just routine, you know, check the books,
translation.zh: 我敢肯定就是例行检查 查一下账本

translation.en: make sure everything's in order, that sort of thing. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 确保一切井然有序 大致就是这样

translation.en: -Okay, when do they get here? -Yeah, why don't you tell us?
translation.zh: 好的 他们什么时候到这里？ -对啊 你怎么不告诉我们？-他们的渡轮将于…

translation.en: -[hesitates] Their ferry is due in a… -[foghorn blaring]
translation.zh: -对啊 你怎么不告诉我们？-他们的渡轮将于…

translation.en: -You're kidding. -Afraid not.
translation.zh: -逗我呢-恐怕我是认真的

translation.en: We need you to go and get him while we finish up around here.
translation.zh: 我们需要你去接他与此同时 我们在这里收拾

translation.en: Huh? I can't. I have a mail drop at Packers Bay today.
translation.zh: 不行 我今天要去帕克斯湾投递邮件

translation.en: The drop can wait, love.
translation.zh: 邮件可以等 亲爱的

translation.en: Besides, you're the face of Fullerton Airways.
translation.zh: 再说了 你是富勒顿航空公司的脸面

translation.en: You should be the first one to greet our guest.
translation.zh: 理应由你第一个迎接客人

translation.en: -But, Dad-- -His name's Mitchell.
translation.zh: -但是爸…-他姓米切尔

translation.en: Maybe take the scenic route back through town
translation.zh: 也许回来的路上 你可以走观光路线这样我们就能把这里整理完

translation.en: so we can finish up around here. And be nice.
translation.zh: 也许回来的路上 你可以走观光路线这样我们就能把这里整理完 友好一点

translation.en: [Dana] You must be Mr. Mitchell.
translation.zh: 你肯定就是米切尔先生了

translation.en: -Pardon? -Uh, the suit tends to be a dead giveaway.
translation.zh: -什么？-在这里 西装往往就是明显的线索

translation.en: -My suit? -I'm Dana. Fullerton Airways. Welcome.
translation.zh: -我的西装？-我是戴娜 富勒顿航空公司的 -欢迎 我们走吧-听我说 姑娘 我觉得…

translation.en: -Let's get it going. -Look, miss, I think--
translation.zh: -欢迎 我们走吧-听我说 姑娘 我觉得…

translation.en: Look, no offense, but I've got a schedule to keep up,
translation.zh: 无意冒犯 但我还有日程要赶

translation.en: so we're gonna make this a bit snappy.
translation.zh: 所以我们得快点把这件事办了

translation.en: I'm here to visit my cousin for a few days.
translation.zh: 我是来待几天 探望我表弟的

translation.en: -Huh? -So, if you don't mind, have a lovely day.
translation.zh: 所以如果你不介意 祝你一天愉快

translation.en: Wait, you're Mr. Mitchell?
translation.zh: 等等 你是米切尔先生？

translation.en: -Yes. Well, uh, William. -Dana.
translation.zh: 是的 我叫威廉 我叫戴娜

translation.en: You must be Mr. Randall's assistant.
translation.zh: 你肯定是兰德尔先生的助手了

translation.en: -[Dana] Chief pilot, actually. -Ah.
translation.zh: 其实是首席飞行员

translation.en: This way.
translation.zh: 走这边

translation.en: [softly] Wanker.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: This is, is it?
translation.zh: 是这辆车吧？

translation.en: -Yeah, this is it. -Right.
translation.zh: -是的 没错-好的

translation.en: Chuck your bags in the back here.
translation.zh: 把你的行李放在后面 动作快点

translation.en: -Chop, chop. We've got work to do. -All right. [clears throat]
translation.zh: 把你的行李放在后面 动作快点 -我还有工作要做-好的

translation.en: [William] So, this is… This is Fullerton?
translation.zh: 所以 这就是富勒顿？

translation.en: [Dana] This is it.
translation.zh: 就是这里

translation.en: It's a long flight just to make a quick pop-in.
translation.zh: 你这么大老远飞来就是为了简短看一下

translation.en: -Anything I should be worried about? -No, no, it's, uh…
translation.zh: 有什么我应该担心的事吗？ 没有 只是…

translation.en: Just wanted to see how you do things around here, that's all.
translation.zh: 只是想看看你们这里是如何运作的 仅此而已

translation.en: Copy that.
translation.zh: 收到

translation.en: Here we are. Fullerton Airways.
translation.zh: 我们到了 富勒顿航空公司

translation.en: [William] Very quaint.
translation.zh: 非常古雅

translation.en: Too much, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸 做得有点过了

translation.en: [chuckles] You must be William Mitchell.
translation.zh: 你肯定就是威廉·米切尔了

translation.en: -Yes. -Jeff Randall.
translation.zh: -没错-我是杰夫·兰德尔

translation.en: Welcome to Fullerton Airways, the region's favorite carrier.
translation.zh: 欢迎光临本地区最受欢迎的航司富勒顿航空公司

translation.en: -Pleasure to meet you, Mr. Randall. -Jeff, mate.
translation.zh: -幸会 兰德尔先生-叫我杰夫就行

translation.en: -Jeff. -[Jeff] This is Nikki.
translation.zh: -杰夫-这位是尼基

translation.en: She's our mechanic and resident tech whiz.
translation.zh: 她是我们的机械师和常驻技术专家

translation.en: If it's broken, she can fix it.
translation.zh: 如果飞机坏了 她可以修理

translation.en: -Very nice to meet you. -How do you do?
translation.zh: -很高兴认识你-你好吗？

translation.en: Good. I do good.
translation.zh: 很好 我挺好的

translation.en: Let's take you on a tour of our humble facilities.
translation.zh: 我们这里设施简单我带你参观一下吧

translation.en: Fair warning. Air conditioning is busted.
translation.zh: 事先警告一下 空调坏了

translation.en: Nikki's waiting for replacement parts. Story of our lives.
translation.zh: 尼基在等替换零件 -这就是我们的生活-是啊

translation.en: -[William] Right. -I'm gonna do some checks on Harriet.
translation.zh: 好了 我要去检查一下哈里特号

translation.en: My God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: -He's just a stiff in a suit, all right? -[Nikki] So hot.
translation.zh: 他就是个穿西装的老古板 好吗？ 太性感了

translation.en: [William] Well. You certainly weren't joking about the air conditioning.
translation.zh: 原来空调的事情你还真不是开玩笑的啊

translation.en: It's, um… It's, uh, rustic.
translation.zh: 这…很质朴

translation.en: Well, we like to keep things pretty down to earth around here. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们这里比较喜欢接地气

translation.en: -Please. -It's fine.
translation.zh: -请-没事

translation.en: Uh, so, uh, how long have you had the place?
translation.zh: 你们拥有这个地方多久了？

translation.en: Uh, my wife and I set it up in '93.
translation.zh: 1993年 我妻子和我把这家公司建在了邻居家旁边

translation.en: Next to our neighbors, uh, we're a bit grassroots,
translation.zh: 1993年 我妻子和我把这家公司建在了邻居家旁边 设施很基础

translation.en: but our customers have always appreciated our personal style.
translation.zh: 但是我们的客户一直很欣赏我们的个性化风格

translation.en: Well, that's what they tell us anyway.
translation.zh: 至少他们是这么跟我们说的

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm sure, yeah. What about you, Will?
translation.zh: -我想也是-你呢 威尔？

translation.en: -What? -Do you run a business with your wife?
translation.zh: -什么？-你也是跟妻子合开公司的吗？

translation.en: Um, no, I'm not married, actually.
translation.zh: 不 我其实还没结婚

translation.en: -Girlfriend? -No, no girlfriend.
translation.zh: -女朋友呢？-没有 没有女朋友

translation.en: -Boyfriend? -[Dana] Ahem. No, I'm…
translation.zh: -男朋友呢？-不 我是…

translation.en: I'm single.
translation.zh: 我单身

translation.en: -Interesting. -Sorry?
translation.zh: -有意思-什么？

translation.en: Um, so my record show that you're predominantly a tour company.
translation.zh: 我的记录显示你们主要是一家旅游公司

translation.en: But I did want to ask about the remote air--
translation.zh: 但我确实想问一下远程空中…

translation.en: -Our remote air support. -Remote air support. Right.
translation.zh: -我们的远程空中支援-远程空中支援

translation.en: Folks who live outside major cities are often reliant
translation.zh: 住在大城市以外的人经常依赖空运

translation.en: on air delivery for, you know, -mail, supplies… -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 进行邮件投递、物资…

translation.en: But, uh, we're re-evaluating that side of the business.
translation.zh: 但我们正在重新评估这一业务

translation.en: Remote air support is the soul of Fullerton Airways.
translation.zh: 远程空中支援是富勒顿航空公司的灵魂

translation.en: We've always done it, and we always will.
translation.zh: 我们一直都在这样做也将永远做下去

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Um, I only ask because I…
translation.zh: 我之所以问 是因为我…

translation.en: Well, I did do a preliminary review of your accounts
translation.zh: 兰德尔先生来这儿之前 我对你们的账目

translation.en: before I came, Mr. Randall.
translation.zh: 进行了初步审查

translation.en: -Jeff, mate. Jeff. -Yeah, Jeff.
translation.zh: -喊我杰夫 兄弟-好的 杰夫

translation.en: Well, it would seem the government subsidizes your fuel
translation.zh: 看起来政府对你们的燃料

translation.en: -and your expenses for those flights. -[Jeff] Yeah, that's right.
translation.zh: 以及这些航班的开支提供了补贴 对 没错

translation.en: Well, given the, um… scale of your operation
translation.zh: 考虑到你们的运营规模

translation.en: and, as you say, the size of your competitors
translation.zh: 以及正如你所说你们竞争对手的规模

translation.en: -and the fact that… -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 以及…如果我没弄错的话你们只有一架能运营的飞机

translation.en: Unless I'm mistaken, you do only have one operational aircraft. Is that right?
translation.zh: 以及…如果我没弄错的话你们只有一架能运营的飞机 我没说错吧？

translation.en: Well, it doesn't…
translation.zh: 这不…

translation.en: It doesn't leave much room for… profit.
translation.zh: 这几乎没有留下多少… 利润空间

translation.en: There's more to life than profits, you know.
translation.zh: 生活中有很多比利润重要的东西

translation.en: Yes, quite. Alas, it's rather a priority.
translation.zh: 是的 没错 但利润是优先事项

translation.en: What's the point of this inspection anyway?
translation.zh: 这次检查的目的是什么？

translation.en: You fly halfway across the world to insult us?
translation.zh: 你飞越半个地球就是为了来侮辱我们吗？

translation.en: -[Jeff] Dana-- -What's going on?
translation.zh: -戴娜-怎么回事？

translation.en: Why don't you, um, show Will Harriet, and we'll tidy up around here?
translation.zh: 你何不给威尔展示一下哈里特号？我们在这里收拾一下

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: Not like I had anywhere to be.
translation.zh: 反正我也没别的地方可去

translation.en: Here she is. Cessna 206.
translation.zh: 就是它了 赛斯纳206型

translation.en: [William] Why Harriet, if you don't mind me asking?
translation.zh: 如果不介意我问的话为什么取名哈里特号？

translation.en: [Dana] That's my mom's sense of humor.
translation.zh: 那是我妈妈的幽默感

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Uh, Harriet as in the female version of Harry.
translation.zh: “哈里特”是女性版的“哈里”

translation.en: I don't get it. Harry Houdini.
translation.zh: -我没听懂-哈里·胡迪尼

translation.en: Harry Houdini?
translation.zh: 哈里·胡迪尼？

translation.en: Harry Houdini, the magician, straightjacket, Harry Houdini?
translation.zh: 哈里·胡迪尼就是那个穿约束衣的魔术师

translation.en: Yeah, well, Houdini was the first person to make a controlled flight in Australia.
translation.zh: 胡迪尼是第一个在澳大利亚驾驶动力飞机的人

translation.en: Diggers Rest, Victoria, 18th March, 1910.
translation.zh: 1910年3月18日在维多利亚州的蒂格斯瑞斯特

translation.en: I didn't know that.
translation.zh: 这我之前不知道

translation.en: [Dana] Yeah, well, my mom was a nut for aviation history.
translation.zh: 好吧 我妈疯狂痴迷航空史

translation.en: Well, it seems the apple didn't fall very far from the tree.
translation.zh: 看来你遗传了母亲的爱好

translation.en: I suppose you'd, um, have to be a…
translation.zh: 我猜你得是个疯子

translation.en: A bit of a nut to fly a thing like this, wouldn't you?
translation.zh: 才会驾驶这种东西飞行 不是吗？

translation.en: You know… [clears throat]
translation.zh: 你知道…

translation.en: I have a delivery scheduled for this morning.
translation.zh: 我今早有要投递的东西

translation.en: Why don't we go up?
translation.zh: 要不我们一起上天吧？

translation.en: Um, in this?
translation.zh: -坐这个？-对啊

translation.en: Yeah. She's sturdy as a rock. Come on.
translation.zh: -坐这个？-对啊 它坚如磐石 快上来吧

translation.en: Right. Big aerodynamic rock.
translation.zh: 好吧 一块巨型空气动力石

translation.en: Strap in.
translation.zh: 系好安全带

translation.en: [Jeff over radio] What you up to, folks?
translation.zh: 你们要干什么？

translation.en: I'm giving our guest a little demonstration.
translation.zh: 我只是给咱们的客人稍微演示一下

translation.en: Um, copy that.
translation.zh: 收到

translation.en: Well, I hope you and our extremely important guest have a good time.
translation.zh: 我希望你和我们这位极为重要的客人玩得开心

translation.en: A really good time.
translation.zh: 真心玩得开心

translation.en: [William] Cozy in here, isn't it?
translation.zh: 这里还挺舒服的 对吧？

translation.en: -You've been doing this long? -[Dana] All my life.
translation.zh: -这一行你做了很久吗？-一辈子都在做

translation.en: [William] That's good.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: This is Foxtrot November Bravo, requesting runway clearance.
translation.zh: 这里是FNB 请求进入跑道

translation.en: -[Jeff] Roger that. You're good to go. -All righty.
translation.zh: 收到 可以进入 好嘞

translation.en: Okay, sit back.
translation.zh: 好的 坐好了

translation.en: [William] Oh, my…
translation.zh: 我的天啊…

translation.en: [Dana] Like I said, sturdy as a rock.
translation.zh: 正如我所说 坚如磐石

translation.en: Yeah, it's a good time.
translation.zh: 是的 挺开心的

translation.en: -I'm having a good time. -You all right?
translation.zh: -我玩得挺开心的-你没事吧？

translation.en: It's tight fit, isn't it?
translation.zh: 这里很挤啊 不是吗？

translation.en: I don't know where to put my hands.
translation.zh: 我感觉双手不知道该放在哪里

translation.en: Like if I touch something, it's gonna…
translation.zh: 总感觉会碰到什么

translation.en: Just put your hands down. Just put them there.
translation.zh: 你只要把双手放下 放在那里就行

translation.en: Man, you poms just can't hack it, can you?
translation.zh: 你们这些英国佬就是受不了飞行 对吧？

translation.en: I was in a hot air balloon once. It's not really the same.
translation.zh: 我之前坐过热气球感觉跟这个完全不一样

translation.en: What happens if something did go wrong?
translation.zh: 如果出岔子了 会怎么样？

translation.en: -Are there parachutes in the back? -Only one.
translation.zh: -后边有降落伞吗？-只有一个

translation.en: It's not funny.
translation.zh: 这不好笑

translation.en: You know, I've had experiences when I was young, I was…
translation.zh: 我小时候有过不愉快的经历 我…

translation.en: Not a plane exactly, but small spaces, you know.
translation.zh: 不是跟坐飞机相关的而是跟狭小空间有关的

translation.en: You gonna talk this much the whole time we're up here?
translation.zh: 我们在天上期间你打算一直不停地聊吗？

translation.en: [breathing heavily] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Whoa. Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Not a bother.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Can I ask… How old is this plane?
translation.zh: 我能不能问一下…这架飞机的机龄？

translation.en: She'll be 52 in June.
translation.zh: -到今年六月就52岁了-五十…

translation.en: Fif… Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -到今年六月就52岁了-五十… 我的天啊

translation.en: Look over there, you can see Mount Abbot.
translation.zh: 快看 你能看到阿伯特山

translation.en: Very pretty.
translation.zh: 非常漂亮

translation.en: Oh. Oh, well…
translation.zh: 哇…

translation.en: Okay. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 好吧 你在干什么？

translation.en: Have a look out.
translation.zh: 看一眼外边

translation.en: All right, sit back.
translation.zh: 好了 坐稳了

translation.en: We're about to come in for our landing.
translation.zh: 我们准备降落了

translation.en: That was fun.
translation.zh: 挺有意思的

translation.en: [Dana] Welcome to Packers Bay.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到帕克斯湾

translation.en: We do drops here every two weeks.
translation.zh: 我们每两周来投递一次

translation.en: Without us, they'd be totally cut off.
translation.zh: 如果没有我们他们完全得不到物资供应

translation.en: Do you… Should I stay here?
translation.zh: 你…我应该留在飞机上吗？

translation.en: What for? They won't bite.
translation.zh: 为什么？他们又不咬人

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Great. And I'm gonna go outside. I'm gonna look like a complete idiot.
translation.zh: 好吧 我要出去了 我肯定会像个白痴一样

translation.en: I'm gonna ruin these shoes.
translation.zh: 会毁了这双鞋子的

translation.en: -Hey gang. -Hey, Dana.
translation.zh: -嘿 大伙们-嘿 戴娜

translation.en: [Dana] Sorry for the delay. Okey-dokey. We've got mail for
translation.zh: 抱歉耽搁了 好了 这里的邮件是给

translation.en: Nick, Serena, Shane. How lucky.
translation.zh: 尼克、莎丽娜、肖恩和乐奇

translation.en: Brought your boyfriend along for the ride, eh, Dana?
translation.zh: 戴娜 你这一趟把男朋友也带来了？

translation.en: Sorry to disappoint, but he's a bigwig from the UK.
translation.zh: 抱歉让大家失望了但他可是英国来的大人物

translation.en: He's come to check if we're spending our money responsibly.
translation.zh: 他是来检查我们是否严格依规开销的

translation.en: [Serena] Well, they're doing a bang-up job.
translation.zh: 他们的工作做得很好

translation.en: -If it were me, I'd give them a raise. -Yes, well, yeah, I'm sure they are.
translation.zh: -如果换做是我 我会给他们加薪-是啊 我相信他们是做得不错

translation.en: You heard about that nasty weather brewing off the coast?
translation.zh: 听说沿海地区可能会有恶劣天气了吗？

translation.en: [Dana] I don't know anything you don't.
translation.zh: 你不掌握的情况 我也不掌握

translation.en: Any luck, she'll drift south like the last one did.
translation.zh: 运气好的话会像上一次一样漂向南方

translation.en: I need to get Becky an X-ray appointment the 19th.
translation.zh: 19日我需要带贝基去照X光

translation.en: -Are you available then? -I think so.
translation.zh: -你有空吗？-应该有

translation.en: -Hey, guys, do you mind if I play? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -嘿 几位 不介意我加入吧？-不介意

translation.en: Me and you'll be on a team. Okay?
translation.zh: 咱俩一队 好吗？

translation.en: Oh, hand ball, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 手球了 女士们先生们

translation.en: -You did it. -[Dana] Having fun?
translation.zh: 你进球了 玩得开心吗？

translation.en: Oh. Well, yeah. You know, they look like professionals.
translation.zh: 玩得开心吗？ 开心 他们看起来很专业 我想着…

translation.en: I thought maybe they can teach me a thing or two.
translation.zh: 也许他们能教我一两招

translation.en: It's time to get going, if you're ready, of course.
translation.zh: 该回去了 当然 前提是你准备好了

translation.en: Yes. Yeah, of course.
translation.zh: 准备好了 当然了

translation.en: -Bye all. -[all] Bye, Dana.
translation.zh: -大家再见-戴娜 再见

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Howdy, howdy. -Hey.
translation.zh: -你们好！-嘿

translation.en: Heath, this is William. William, Heath.
translation.zh: 希斯 这位是威廉威廉 这位是希斯

translation.en: -G'day. -Hi. G'day. Good… Good day.
translation.zh: -日安-日安 日安

translation.en: [chuckles] You're the one checking in? Yeah. Yes, I think so, yeah.
translation.zh: -办入住的人就是你吗？-对 是的 应该是的

translation.en: No worries. Give me a second and I'll grab the key.
translation.zh: 别担心 等我一下 我去拿钥匙

translation.en: Thank you very much for the demonstration today.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你今天的演示

translation.en: It was very, uh, educational, if not spotted with terror.
translation.zh: 非常有教育意义 但也有些许恐怖

translation.en: Oh, don't mention it.
translation.zh: 别客气

translation.en: -Well, it's been fun. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -挺有意思的-是啊

translation.en: Probably won't see you much while you're here, so, uh,
translation.zh: 你在这里期间 我们可能不太会见到

translation.en: -take it easy. -All right.
translation.zh: 所以放轻松 好的

translation.en: Quite a character, isn't she?
translation.zh: 她可真有个性 不是吗？

translation.en: Yes. Yes, very tenacious.
translation.zh: 是的 没错 非常固执

translation.en: Mate, you have no idea.
translation.zh: 超出你的想象

translation.en: Here you go. Apartment number two.
translation.zh: 给你 二号公寓

translation.en: Across the tarmac, up the stairs, and second on your left.
translation.zh: 穿过沥青路 上楼梯 左边第二间

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Across the tarmac.
translation.zh: 穿过沥青路

translation.en: Across the tarmac, okay.
translation.zh: 穿过沥青路 好的

translation.en: Across the tarmac.
translation.zh: 穿过沥青路

translation.en: [groans softly] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的老天

translation.en: [panting] Oh, God.
translation.zh: 妈呀

translation.en: -Oh, thank God. Oh, thank God. -[cell phone ringing]
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 谢天谢地

translation.en: Hi, Dad.
translation.zh: 嗨 爸

translation.en: Ah, are you settled in yet?
translation.zh: 嗨 你安顿好了吗？

translation.en: How's the arse end of the world?
translation.zh: 在那偏远的地方感觉如何？

translation.en: Um, well, you know, I suppose it has its charms.
translation.zh: 我觉得这里有它独特的魅力

translation.en: They're certainly a tightly knit community here.
translation.zh: 这里有一个紧密团结的社区

translation.en: Don't start getting attached. Have you reviewed their financials yet?
translation.zh: 别开始动情 你审查财务状况了吗？

translation.en: No. No, I haven't quite done that yet, but I will.
translation.zh: 没 我还没查 但我会查的

translation.en: Time is of the essence, William.
translation.zh: 时间至关重要 威廉

translation.en: Shut that place down. Get yourself home.
translation.zh: 关停那个地方 然后就回家

translation.en: Knock, knock.
translation.zh: 笃笃笃

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: -Morning, Will! -Oh, my giddy aunt.
translation.zh: -早上好…-我的老天爷啊

translation.en: -Sleep well? -Uh, yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 睡得还好吗？ 挺好的 虽然很热 但睡得还好

translation.en: You know, the heat notwithstanding.
translation.zh: 挺好的 虽然很热 但睡得还好

translation.en: Losing the tie might help.
translation.zh: 松松领带可能会好一些

translation.en: This is the tropics, mate. You should relax a bit.
translation.zh: 这是热带 兄弟 你应该放松一点

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Well, this is you.
translation.zh: 这是你的位置

translation.en: -Feel free to settle in. -Great.
translation.zh: -请随意-太好了

translation.en: Well, I'm ready to jump into those financials if you are.
translation.zh: 好了 如果你准备好了我想看一下财务账本

translation.en: Uh, yeah, the financials.
translation.zh: 财务账本 对

translation.en: I definitely do have them, just finalizing some reporting.
translation.zh: 财务账本我肯定有但还有一些申报没有完成

translation.en: -Morning. -Ah, here she is. Ready to start the day.
translation.zh: -早上好-她来了

translation.en: -[Dana] Morning. -Morning.
translation.zh: -准备好开始新的一天了-早

translation.en: Here I am, like every other morning.
translation.zh: 我来了 每个早晨都是如此

translation.en: Uh, have you seen Nikki?
translation.zh: 你见到尼基了吗？

translation.en: She's supposed to be helping me out with the drops today.
translation.zh: 她今天应该帮我一起投递的

translation.en: Well, actually, Nikki called.
translation.zh: 其实尼基来过电话了

translation.en: Her bike broke down on Macquarie Street, so she'll be late.
translation.zh: 她的摩托在麦觉理街上抛锚了所以她会迟到一会儿

translation.en: Seriously? We can't afford another late start.
translation.zh: 不是吧？我们可不能再延误一次了

translation.en: We've got to get those first aid kits to Wattle Hills.
translation.zh: 我们得把那些急救箱送到瓦特山

translation.en: Hey, how about this?
translation.zh: 嘿 要不然这样？

translation.en: Why doesn't Will go out and help you on your drops today, huh?
translation.zh: 何不让威尔去帮你一起投递？

translation.en: -Him? -Me?
Well, why not? Dana needs help.
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？ 戴娜需要帮忙

translation.en: And in the meantime, I can get these reports ready for you.
translation.zh: 与此同时我可以把报告给你准备出来

translation.en: Seems a good solution for everybody. What do you say?
translation.zh: 这样一来大家都能满意你俩意下如何？

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 挺好

translation.en: -Great. -Great.
translation.zh: -太好了-太好了

translation.en: Do you really think they're gonna hit it off?
translation.zh: 你真觉得他俩能相处得来吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Trust me.
translation.zh: 可以的 相信我

translation.en: She never hangs out with anyone new. This will be good for her.
translation.zh: 她从不和陌生人一起出去所以这对她有好处

translation.en: Plus, it can't hurt to make friends with the money people.
translation.zh: 再说了 跟有钱人交朋友肯定没坏处

translation.en: [Dana] You're handling it better than you did yesterday.
translation.zh: 你今天的状态比昨天好多了

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about. I'm the epitome of a comfortable flyer.
translation.zh: 你在说什么？我就是合格飞行员的化身

translation.en: So, what's life like in ITCM financial?
translation.zh: ITCM金融公司的生活是什么样的？

translation.en: Must be pretty different than doing this for living.
translation.zh: 肯定和干这一行为生大不相同

translation.en: Yes. Well, it's certainly less exciting. Less life-threatening.
translation.zh: 确实没有这么刺激 也没有这么危及生命

translation.en: Lots of fiscal projections and revenue KPIs.
translation.zh: 涉及很多财政预测以及关键性收入指标

translation.en: Were you into that sort of thing as a kid? Did you really love the spreadsheets?
translation.zh: 你小时候就真心喜欢这些东西吗？真的喜欢电子表格吗？

translation.en: Not… Not so much.
translation.zh: 不怎么喜欢

translation.en: But Dad owned the business, you know,
translation.zh: 但我父亲是公司老板 所以…

translation.en: so it was just a given that I was gonna end up there.
translation.zh: 我干这一行就是注定的

translation.en: That sounds familiar.
translation.zh: 这话听起来很耳熟

translation.en: Your dad seems very friendly.
translation.zh: 你父亲看起来很友善

translation.en: Oh, everyone loves Jeff, and Jeff loves everyone back.
translation.zh: 每个人都喜欢杰夫杰夫也很喜欢他们每个人

translation.en: What's it like working with him?
translation.zh: 跟他共事是什么样的体验？

translation.en: I won't have it any other way.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢跟他共事

translation.en: Doesn't mean it doesn't get turbulent sometimes.
translation.zh: 虽然有时候也会遇到颠簸

translation.en: -That was a flying pun, wasn't it? -Depends if you found it funny or not.
translation.zh: -你这是飞行双关语吧？-取决于你是否觉得好笑

translation.en: Sometimes he wants to take the business in a different direction, that's all.
translation.zh: 只是有时他想把生意引向其他方向

translation.en: He might be onto something.
translation.zh: 他这么做可能不无道理

translation.en: You could say he was charting a different course.
translation.zh: 可以看作他在绘制另一条航线

translation.en: That was a flying pun.
translation.zh: 这是个飞行双关语

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Is this… Is this like a vintage car where it sort of has character?
translation.zh: 这是不是像那种有自己性格的老爷车？

translation.en: -[rattling] -Something like that.
translation.zh: 差不多吧

translation.en: That's normal? That's a normal sound?
translation.zh: 这正常吗？这是正常声音吗？

translation.en: Oh, that's not a good sound.
translation.zh: -这声音不太对劲啊-紧急求救

translation.en: Mayday, mayday. Fullerton Airways, this is Foxtrot November Bravo.
translation.zh: -这声音不太对劲啊-紧急求救 富勒顿航空公司 这里是FNB

translation.en: Mayday?
translation.zh: 紧急求救？

translation.en: [Jeff] Dana, what's wrong?
translation.zh: 戴娜 怎么了？

translation.en: We're suffering engine failure about five miles north of Sinclair Bay.
translation.zh: 在辛克莱湾以北大约八公里处突发发动机故障

translation.en: I'll make an emergency landing. Think it's the new exhaust valve.
translation.zh: 我要紧急着陆了可能是新排气阀的问题

translation.en: Foxtrot November Bravo, Fullerton Airways. Copy that.
translation.zh: FNB 富勒顿航空公司收到

translation.en: Stay on frequency and advise on landing.
translation.zh: 保持通讯 随时告知降落情况

translation.en: And be safe.
translation.zh: 注意安全

translation.en: [William] Oh, my God. Okay.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 好吧

translation.en: [breathing heavily] Okay, I feel like
translation.zh: 好吧 我感觉

translation.en: maybe this would be a good time to tell you about my fear of flying.
translation.zh: 这也许是告诉你我害怕坐飞机的好时候

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -Come on.
translation.zh: -我的天啊-拜托！

translation.en: [William] Dana?
translation.zh: 戴娜？

translation.en: Dana, Dana, Dana, that's very, very close.
translation.zh: 戴娜 距离太近了

translation.en: Let's never do that again, ever.
translation.zh: -我们再也别这样了-好的

translation.en: Fullerton Airways, we're in one piece.
translation.zh: 富勒顿航空公司 我们安全降落了

translation.en: I'm gonna go check out the damage. I'll keep you posted.
translation.zh: 我去检查一下受损情况有消息我会通知你的

translation.en: -Over. -Roger that. Stay safe.
translation.zh: -完毕-收到 注意安全

translation.en: [William] And now it's zero operational aircraft.
translation.zh: 现在没有可运营的飞机了

translation.en: Wonderful.
translation.zh: “太好了”

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: So, where are we exactly?
translation.zh: 我们到底在哪？

translation.en: Uh, we're a little northwest of Cape Flattery.
translation.zh: 福拉德利角西北一点点

translation.en: It's not far from Lizard Island.
translation.zh: 离蜥蜴岛不远

translation.en: Lizard Island? That's… That's good.
translation.zh: 蜥蜴岛？“不错”

translation.en: So, what do we do now? We light up a flare or something or?
translation.zh: 我们现在怎么办？点亮照明弹还是什么？

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: What do you mean "no"? What, no?
translation.zh: 你说“不”是什么意思？什么不？

translation.en: It will be hours before someone's able to come pick us up.
translation.zh: 等有人来接我们起码也要等好几个小时

translation.en: Plus, I'd have to leave Harriet. There's no way.
translation.zh: 况且 那意味着我要丢下哈里特号这是绝对不行的

translation.en: If you want something done, you have to do it yourself.
translation.zh: 自己动手 丰衣足食

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Pass me the shifter.
translation.zh: 把活动扳手递给我

translation.en: -Shifter? -It's that thing there.
translation.zh: -活动扳手？-就是那个东西

translation.en: To the right.
translation.zh: 右边

translation.en: The other right.
translation.zh: 另一侧的右边

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: I need you to come and push down over here.
translation.zh: 我需要你过来 把这个往下压

translation.en: -In there? -Yeah. There.
translation.zh: -在那里头？-对 这里

translation.en: Yeah. Now, don't loosen the pressure.
translation.zh: 好的 现在别松劲儿

translation.en: I'm not loosening the pressure.
translation.zh: 我没松劲儿

translation.en: [chuckles] You may have pressed a little too hard.
translation.zh: 你可能劲儿用太大了一点

translation.en: Okay, but I didn't loosen the pressure.
translation.zh: 好吧 但我没松劲儿

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna need a Phillips head screwdriver next.
translation.zh: 好的 接下来我需要一把十字头螺丝刀

translation.en: Ah-ha. I know that one.
translation.zh: 这我认识

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Okay, cross your fingers.
translation.zh: 好了 祈祷吧

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 加油啊

translation.en: Come on, girl.
translation.zh: 加油啊 宝贝飞机

translation.en: These are good sounds.
translation.zh: 这声音不错

translation.en: This feels good. This does feel good.
translation.zh: 这感觉真棒 这感觉真的很棒

translation.en: Oh… bravo.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: We know what we're doing.
translation.zh: 我们是专业的

translation.en: [all] Cheers!
translation.zh: -干杯！-干杯！

translation.en: Will, who am I? "Oh, my God! Oh, my God!"
translation.zh: 威尔 你当时就说“天啊！” -“我的天啊！”-你真逗

translation.en: That's very funny.
translation.zh: -“我的天啊！”-你真逗

translation.en: Oi, leave him. Poor fellow.
translation.zh: 别难为他了

translation.en: He's only been on the job for two days, he's already fixing planes.
translation.zh: 他干这份工作才两天就已经开始修飞机了

translation.en: Thank you, Nikki.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 尼基

translation.en: -Fixing plane… -Okay, all right. Forget her, all right?
translation.zh: -修飞机？-好吧 别理她了 好吗？

translation.en: If you get over this finance stuff, come work for me as my assistant.
translation.zh: 等你把这财务的事情搞完之后来当我的助手吧

translation.en: That's a very attractive offer.
translation.zh: 你这份邀约很吸引人啊

translation.en: -Don't do that. -No, I'd like that.
translation.zh: -别做-不 我喜欢做

translation.en: -It would be an honor, actually, for him. -[cell phone chimes]
translation.zh: -其实 这对他来说会是一种荣誉-别这样

translation.en: -Oh, sorry. -You…
translation.zh: -抱歉-你…

translation.en: -No, no, no. -Please.
translation.zh: -不-你请

translation.en: -[Heath] Howdy, howdy. -Hi.
translation.zh: -你好啊-嗨

translation.en: It's been a long time since I've seen you look that way at anything
translation.zh: 这是很久以来我第一次见你用这种眼神

translation.en: -that didn't have wings and fuselage. -Excuse me?
translation.zh: -看一样没有机翼机身的东西-瞎说什么呢？

translation.en: I'm just trying to be a good host.
translation.zh: 我只不过是想尽地主之谊

translation.en: Seems like a nice enough guy.
translation.zh: 看起来这家伙还挺不错的

translation.en: Not entirely sure about the wardrobe choices.
translation.zh: 但衣品我不敢苟同

translation.en: Mmm. Tell me about it.
translation.zh: 可不是嘛

translation.en: -[Heath] Can you do us all a favor? -Mmm?
translation.zh: 你帮我们大家一个忙吧？

translation.en: Don't screw it up.
translation.zh: 别搞砸了

translation.en: I'm sorry. But, would you mind your own business?
translation.zh: 抱歉 但你能别多管闲事吗？

translation.en: Say hi to your boyfriend for me.
translation.zh: 替我跟你男朋友问好

translation.en: Oh, subtle way of getting cut off, okay.
translation.zh: 你很巧妙地逃过一劫 好吧

translation.en: -It's for Dad, really. -[all laughing]
translation.zh: 这是给爸爸的

translation.en: [reporter on TV] More on that category 3 low pressure system
translation.zh: 继续播报在海岸附近

translation.en: gathering momentum off the coast.
translation.zh: 积聚势头的低压气团

translation.en: Although presently forecast to continue moving in a south easterly direction,
translation.zh: 尽管当前的预报显示 该风暴将继续向东南方向移动

translation.en: tropical storms of this type are difficult to predict.
translation.zh: 但众所周知 这类热带风暴难以预测

translation.en: The Bureau of Meteorology has issued…
translation.zh: 但众所周知 这类热带风暴难以预测 -气象局已经发布…-天啊！我希望这个风暴能消散

translation.en: Yikes. I hope that one fizzles out.
translation.zh: -气象局已经发布…-天啊！我希望这个风暴能消散

translation.en: -You okay there, buddy? -Yes. Yeah, very good. Really good.
translation.zh: -兄弟 你还好吗？-还好 很好 真的

translation.en: [man] Hello, Australia. Welcome to the gala.
translation.zh: 澳大利亚的各位 欢迎来参加盛会

translation.en: You play, Will?
translation.zh: 威尔 你打吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, yeah. Just about since I could walk.
translation.zh: 打 从我能走路起就打板球了

translation.en: Oh, boy, here we go.
translation.zh: 好吧 这下可有得聊了

translation.en: Well, well, well.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Hope you're not too sore about the Ashes.
translation.zh: -灰烬杯输给我们你没耿耿于怀吧？-不该这么快提这事 杰夫

translation.en: That's too soon, Jeff. That's too soon.
translation.zh: -灰烬杯输给我们你没耿耿于怀吧？-不该这么快提这事 杰夫 我还心伤未愈呢

translation.en: Sorry, mate.
translation.zh: 抱歉 兄弟

translation.en: [groans] We felt the pain at Lord's that day, I can assure you.
translation.zh: 有一点可以确认那天在罗德板球场我们心痛欲绝

translation.en: You were there in person?
translation.zh: 你当时在比赛现场？

translation.en: Yeah, well, Dad's a member, so we… You know, he's got good seats.
translation.zh: 是的 我父亲是会员所以我们总能拿到好座位的票

translation.en: Oh. I bet you and your dad were fuming.
translation.zh: 你们父子俩当时肯定都很生气

translation.en: Well, he wasn't there.
translation.zh: 他当时没在场

translation.en: Um, in fact, I'm not sure he's ever come to a match.
translation.zh: 我不确定他是否去现场看过比赛

translation.en: His loss.
translation.zh: 那是他的损失

translation.en: Well, maybe it's better that he wasn't there
translation.zh: 也许他不在场反而更好

translation.en: -given the thrashing we gave you. -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 毕竟你们输得很惨

translation.en: -He doesn't hold back, does he? -[Dana] No
translation.zh: 他一点也不客气 是吧？

translation.en: [Nikki] Down it, Uncle.
translation.zh: 一口气干了！

translation.en: Night, kids, I'm gonna hit the hay.
translation.zh: 孩子们 我要去睡觉了

translation.en: All that paperwork you need will be there in the morning, ready for you.
translation.zh: 你需要的所有文件早上都会给你准备好

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I think you'll see that there's a bit of life in the old girl yet.
translation.zh: 我想你会发现这老骨头里还有一丝生机

translation.en: -Yes. Yeah, I'm sure there is. -See you, kids.
translation.zh: -是的 的确有生机-回见 孩子们

translation.en: -Night, Dad. -[Nikki] Goodnight.
translation.zh: -晚安 爸爸-晚安

translation.en: Okay, peeps. That is me, I'm out. I'll see you both tomorrow.
translation.zh: 好了 伙计们 我要走了明天跟你俩再见

translation.en: Dana, you can't go because you have to walk Will home.
translation.zh: 戴娜 你不能走因为你得送威尔回住处

translation.en: -Oh, I think he's fine. -I'm just on the tarmac.
translation.zh: -他没事的-我就住在沥青路尽头

translation.en: I appreciate you trying to be a strong independent man,
translation.zh: 你在努力表现出坚强独立这点我很欣赏

translation.en: but it's dangerous out there, okay? Drop bears.
translation.zh: 但外头很危险 好吗？有落熊

translation.en: Drop bears?
translation.zh: 落熊？

translation.en: You need a guide.
translation.zh: 你需要个向导

translation.en: Well, I mean, sure, I mean…
translation.zh: 好吧 当然了

translation.en: It'll be nice to have a guide, I suppose.
translation.zh: 我估计有个向导会挺好的

translation.en: What's it like living in a place like this?
translation.zh: 住在这种地方是什么样的感受？

translation.en: A lovely place, a lovely place like this?
translation.zh: 我的意思是 像这样很漂亮的地方

translation.en: Well, everybody knows everybody.
translation.zh: 大家彼此都认识

translation.en: Everyone knows everyone's business.
translation.zh: 大家都非常了解彼此

translation.en: What they don't know about you, they will assume pretty quick.
translation.zh: 若你有他们不了解的事情他们很快就会猜到

translation.en: Also, if you have a break up, get used to seeing your ex every day
translation.zh: 而且 如果你分手了你会习惯于每天都见到你的前任

translation.en: because they're probably making your morning coffee.
translation.zh: 因为很有可能你早餐的咖啡就是他们冲的

translation.en: Right, I will… I will bear that in mind.
translation.zh: 好吧 这一点我会记住的

translation.en: No. But honestly, no pollution, no noise, no traffic,
translation.zh: 不 但是说实话 这里没污染、没噪音、不堵车

translation.en: and your neighbors are like family.
translation.zh: 邻居就像是家人

translation.en: to the Lockhart River, 1600 kilometers round trip.

translation.en: That's my home.

translation.en: And what about your parents?

translation.en: I mean, why did they want to live here?

translation.en: It was my mom. Clara.

translation.en: She always believed in giving back and helping others.

translation.en: And she loved to fly.

translation.en: I mean, Fullerton Airways was her dream.

translation.en: -Sorry, I didn't mean to… -No, no, no.

translation.en: I guess that's why I'm so protective because…

translation.en: Well, it's the last part of her that I still have.

translation.en: -Maybe that's weird though. -No.

translation.en: No, it isn't at all.
translation.zh: 一点都不怪

translation.en: I mean, that's the perk of the small town life.

translation.en: You see, when Mom…

translation.en: Well, yeah.
translation.zh: 你懂的

translation.en: Dad and I, we never felt alone, ever.
translation.zh: 我和我爸从未感到过孤单

translation.en: That helped a lot.

translation.en: Yeah, I can imagine.

translation.en: -Anyway, what about you? -Me?
translation.zh: -你呢？-我？

translation.en: Growing up in the big city, next in line to your dad's throne,

translation.en: -what's that like? -Um…
translation.zh: 那是什么感觉？

translation.en: To be honest, it's pretty boring.

translation.en: You know, Dad owned a multimillion-pound company, he didn't…

translation.en: Didn't really have time for, um,

translation.en: well, school fetes, rugby matches, that sort of thing.
translation.zh: 学校活动、橄榄球比赛诸如此类的事情

translation.en: -Never would have guessed. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: “这我可真没想到”

translation.en: Yeah, it turns out, working for him wasn't really all that different.

translation.en: You know, you can always take Nikki up on her offer.
translation.zh: 你可以接受尼基的邀约

translation.en: A little change of scenery,

translation.en: -get your hands dirty. -Yep.

translation.en: I think you'll look pretty good in a pair of overalls.

translation.en: -Do you? -Mmm.
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: They go well with my brogues.

translation.en: Not so sure about that bit though.

translation.en: -[William] Wow. -Yeah. It's pretty beautiful, huh?
translation.zh: -哇-是啊 很漂亮吧？

translation.en: It doesn't look like this back home.
translation.zh: 在我家 天空可不像这样

translation.en: -[Dana] So, that's the emu in the sky. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好 那个就像是空中的鸸鹋-好吧

translation.en: That one is special because it's outlined by the dark areas of the night sky,
translation.zh: 那个很特别因为它是夜空的黑暗区域勾勒出来的

translation.en: -not by the stars. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 而不是被星星所勾勒的

translation.en: It's been featured in traditional storytelling for thousands of years.

translation.en: That's beautiful.

translation.en: Oh. That one over there you can see, that's actually--

translation.en: -Southern Cross. Is it? -Bingo.

translation.en: I knew that.

translation.en: Oh, that big, bad boy over there, that's the Tarantula Nebula.

translation.en: -Tarantula? -Mmm-hmm.

translation.en: -It seems rather fitting for this place. -[chuckles]

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: You know…
translation.zh: 你知道…

translation.en: I'm very impressed.

translation.en: Well, they're handy to know.

translation.en: When push comes to shove,

translation.en: a pilot can always count on them to point the way.

translation.en: -No, that's not funny. What is that? -That is a koala.

translation.en: That sounds like a dinosaur.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, Nikki was right.

translation.en: I don't disagree with her.

translation.en: -Right. -[both chuckle]

translation.en: I've taken up so much of your time already.

translation.en: Well, uh, yeah, I guess I could use some help picking up the slack.

translation.en: Right. Right. Good.

translation.en: Good, great. Great, fantastic.

translation.en: I believe this is yours.

translation.en: Yeah. Yes. Thank you.

translation.en: Thank you. [clears throat]

translation.en: -Wide. -Dad!

translation.en: and I haven't heard from you. What's the delay?

translation.en: Dad?

translation.en: Dad!

translation.en: Dana!

translation.en: Dad.

translation.en: Dana!

translation.en: Dana!

translation.en: Dad.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Go to hell.

translation.en: Oh. Oh, did you not tell him, Will?

translation.zh: 刚刚说到最精彩的部分

translation.en: I'll find some light. There's a lantern here somewhere. Oh, here we go.
translation.zh: 我来找灯 这下边有盏应急灯 找到了

translation.en: Look, um…
translation.zh: 听我说…

translation.en: You don't…
translation.zh: 你不…

translation.en: -You don't need to say anything. -[William] Dana…
translation.zh: -你不必说什么-戴娜…

translation.en: I thought I always knew where I was going to end up, you know?
translation.zh: 我曾经以为我一直知道自己最终会走向何方

translation.en: But coming here…
translation.zh: 但来到这里

translation.en: and meeting you,
translation.zh: 遇见了你

translation.en: meeting all of you…
translation.zh: 遇见了你们所有人…

translation.en: You don't know what it's like where I come from.
translation.zh: 你们不了解我们那里的情况

translation.en: Everybody's out for their cut.
translation.zh: 每个人都在寻求自己的利益

translation.en: But you actually care.
translation.zh: 但你是真心在乎

translation.en: You care about people.
translation.zh: 你真心在乎所有人

translation.en: You care about protecting the things that are important to you.
translation.zh: 你在乎保护对你而言重要的东西

translation.en: I don't think you realize how rare that is.
translation.zh: 我觉得你没意识到这有多难能可贵

translation.en: A week ago, this is the last place on earth I wanted to be.
translation.zh: 一周前 这里是我在地球上最不想来的地方

translation.en: Now I don't want to leave.
translation.zh: 而现在 我却不想离开了

translation.en: I promise I am going to fix this.
translation.zh: 我保证 我肯定会把这件事解决

translation.en: I swear.
translation.zh: 我发誓

translation.en: Isn't this a dog's breakfast.
translation.zh: 真是一团糟

translation.en: What are we looking at here? What's the damage?
translation.zh: 这里是什么情况？受损情况如何？

translation.en: Category 3… Geez.
translation.zh: 三级风暴…老天

translation.en: Wind's 250, 280 K per hour.
translation.zh: 风速每小时250到280公里

translation.en: There might not be a Fullerton Airways left to save if it goes on like this.
translation.zh: 照这样刮下去估计都没有富勒顿航空公司给你救了

translation.en: There's gonna be a lot of people out there who need help.
translation.zh: 外面会有很多人需要帮助

translation.en: [Dana] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey. [clears throat] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: It's over.
translation.zh: 风暴停了

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Jeff] Bloody hell.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: I'll go and get the genny.
translation.zh: 我去拿发电机

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna do checks on Harriet.
translation.zh: 好的 我去检查一下哈里特号

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna see if I can fire up the radio.
translation.zh: 好的 我去看看能不能把电台打开

translation.en: Oh, Jesus.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[radio feedback] -[Nikki] Uh, testing, testing. Fullerton Airways radio check.
translation.zh: 测试富勒顿航空公司广播电台 检查

translation.en: Fullerton Airways radio check. Fullerton Airways radio check.
translation.zh: 富勒顿航空公司广播电台 检查

translation.en: Harriet's fine. There's no damage that I can see.
translation.zh: 哈里特号还好 我目测没受损

translation.en: At least there's that.
translation.zh: 起码还有哈里特号

translation.en: -No signal from here. -Yeah, I wouldn't hold my breath.
translation.zh: 这里没信号 我可没指望会有信号

translation.en: You're lucky that I'm so diddly.
translation.zh: 你们很幸运 因为我超厉害

translation.en: [man on radio] Mayday, mayday. Calling anyone out there.
translation.zh: 紧急求救 不管是谁 听到请回答

translation.en: This is the Bloomfield General Store. We require immediate help.
translation.zh: 这里是布卢姆菲尔德综合商店我们需要立即救援

translation.en: [officer] Come in. I repeat, this is the Packers Bay Police Department.
translation.zh: 请回话 重复 这里是帕克斯湾警察局

translation.en: We are requesting…
translation.zh: 我们请求…

translation.en: [woman] This is from the council. We're in dire need of assistance.
translation.zh: 这里是北部海滩委员会我们急需帮助

translation.en: All right. There are people out there who need our help. I'll man the radio.
translation.zh: 好吧 外边有人需要我们帮助 我来负责通讯联络

translation.en: Nikki, you start getting supply packages together.
translation.zh: 尼基 你开始准备供应包

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: Dana and William, get that plane in the air.
translation.zh: 戴娜和威廉你们负责用飞机运输物资

translation.en: Well, we haven't got all day!
translation.zh: 时间不等人！

translation.en: [Dana] Hey. Snap out of it.
translation.zh: 嘿 振作起来

translation.en: Take these over to Simon in the medical tent.
translation.zh: 把这些交给医疗帐篷里的西蒙

translation.en: We'll drop off the rest and fly some folks to the hospital.
translation.zh: 然后我们去投递剩下的物资送一些人去医院

translation.en: -[William] Yeah. -Come on, this way.
translation.zh: -好的-来吧 这边

translation.en: Right, we still got some more space here, mate.
translation.zh: 还有些空间 哥们

translation.en: [man] This is the last of the apple boxes.
translation.zh: 好的 这是最后几个箱子

translation.en: [Jeff] Uh, Chilli Beach, supplies on the way. ETA 15:40.
translation.zh: 辣椒海滩 物资已在途中预计下午3点40分到达

translation.en: There's medical, food, water.
translation.zh: 有医疗用品、食物、水

translation.en: Threw in a bottle of Scotch in there for you, Steve.
translation.zh: 给你加了一瓶苏格兰威士忌 史蒂夫

translation.en: Thought you might need it. Over.
translation.zh: 觉得你可能会需要 完毕

translation.en: Roger, Packers Bay.
translation.zh: 收到 帕克斯湾

translation.en: Supplies on the way. There's medical, food, water, blankets.
translation.zh: 物资已在途中有医疗用品、食物、水、毯子

translation.en: [Dana] All right, you guys have that.
translation.zh: 好了 这些给你们

translation.en: -Hey. You're looking better. -[man] Yeah.
translation.zh: 嘿 你看起来好多了

translation.en: -Hey. -Please. Here, have this…
translation.zh: -嘿-请坐这里 坐…

translation.en: [Dana] No, yeah, that's fine. Keep it.
translation.zh: 没事 没关系 你坐吧

translation.en: You know, you, um…
translation.zh: 你知道吗 你…

translation.en: -You were amazing today. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你今天表现棒极了

translation.en: No, I mean it.
translation.zh: 不 我是认真的

translation.en: Today was a team effort.
translation.zh: 今天都是团队的努力

translation.en: Yeah, I'd rather think I was more there for emotional support.
translation.zh: 好吧 我刚才那番话其实更倾向于寻求你的情感支持

translation.en: The only way we were able to do as much as we did today was because of your help.
translation.zh: 我们今天之所以能做这么多全都是因为你的帮助

translation.en: Not everyone would jump in like that.
translation.zh: 并不是谁都会当机立断出手相助的

translation.en: I've got to admit it.
translation.zh: 我不得不承认

translation.en: Having a flying partner these last few days, well,
translation.zh: 过去这几天 有一个飞行伙伴

translation.en: hasn't been so bad.
translation.zh: 还挺不错的

translation.en: So, thanks.
translation.zh: 所以 谢谢

translation.en: After everything these people have been through,
translation.zh: 这些人虽然经受了这一切

translation.en: they still manage to muster a smile.
translation.zh: 但他们还是能挤出一个微笑

translation.en: [Dana] Well, I guess that's a part of what makes this place so special.
translation.zh: 我想 这就是这个地方如此特别的部分原因

translation.en: [William] I completely forgot I had this on me.
translation.zh: 我忘了身上还带着这个

translation.en: I guess you're gonna want to get that dry cleaned.
translation.zh: 我觉得你得把它干洗一下

translation.en: Or not.
translation.zh: 不干洗也行

translation.en: -Wait. How much did that cost? -A lot.
translation.zh: 等等 那条领带多少钱？

translation.en: Yeah. Right.
translation.zh: -很贵-好吧

translation.en: To Fullerton Airways.
translation.zh: 敬富勒顿航空公司

translation.en: To Fullerton Airways.
translation.zh: 敬富勒顿航空公司

translation.en: You know, without the tie,
translation.zh: 你知道吗 不打领带的话

translation.en: you kind of look like you could fit in here.
translation.zh: 你看起来似乎能适合这里

translation.en: Just maybe.
translation.zh: 也许吧

translation.en: -I hate to interrupt, but… -Hello, Dad.
translation.zh: -我不想打扰 但是…-你好 爸爸

translation.en: I've just had an e-mail from ITCM Financial.
translation.zh: 我刚收到ITCM金融公司的一封邮件

translation.en: And?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: Well, they've informed me that we're shut down. Effective immediately.
translation.zh: 他们告知我要把这里关停 即刻生效

translation.en: -They're… -Dad.
translation.zh: -他们…-爸

translation.en: They're splitting us up for parts.
translation.zh: 他们要把公司资产拆卖

translation.en: Will, if you're gonna do something, now would be a really good time.
translation.zh: 威尔… 如果你准备出手的话现在会是一个很好的时机

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Mary] Hello. Duncan Mitchell's office.
translation.zh: 你好 邓肯·米切尔办公室

translation.en: Mary, it's Will. William. Can you, um, put my father on, please?
translation.zh: 玛丽 我是威尔 威廉能麻烦你让我父亲接电话吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. Mr. Mitchell's in a meeting.
translation.zh: 抱歉 米切尔先生正在开会

translation.en: Mary, can you go and get my father now? Please, it's an emergency.
translation.zh: 玛丽 你能立刻去找我父亲让他来接电话吗？拜托 事出紧急

translation.en: Just a moment.
translation.zh: 稍等

translation.en: William, this had better be damned important.
translation.zh: 威廉 你最好是有要事报告

translation.en: Dad, don't sell Fullerton Airways.
translation.zh: 爸 别卖富勒顿航空公司

translation.en: All right? Please don't do this.
translation.zh: 好吗？求你了 别这样做

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.zh: 你是认真的吗？

translation.en: Scrapping that two-bit airline
translation.zh: 关停那家质次价廉的航空公司

translation.en: is about the only bright side of this debacle.
translation.zh: 会是这场灾难中唯一的好处

translation.en: I can find the money somewhere else.
translation.zh: 我可以从别的地方筹钱

translation.en: All right? Just give me… Give me time.
translation.zh: 好吗？给我…给我一点时间

translation.en: The board has been briefed. I did your job for you.
translation.zh: 已经向董事会做了简报 我替你把事情办了

translation.en: It's done.
translation.zh: 木已成舟

translation.en: Dad, there's… There's value here. All right?
translation.zh: 爸 这里头…有价值 好吗？

translation.en: What was the point of me coming all this way?
translation.zh: 我大老远来这里的意义何在？

translation.en: The point of the venture was to prove to the company that you were ready.
translation.zh: 这次冒险的目的是为了向公司证明你已经准备好了

translation.en: Ready to take the next step.
translation.zh: 准备好迈出下一步

translation.en: Ready for real responsibility. I believed that you were--
translation.zh: 准备好承担真正的责任我以前相信你是可以的 但是…

translation.en: Dad, you're not listening to what I'm saying.
translation.zh: 爸 你没在听我说话

translation.en: We'll talk more when you get back.
translation.zh: 威廉 等你回来我们再详聊

translation.en: -No, Dana-- -Best to let her go, mate.
translation.zh: -不 戴娜…-最好让她走吧 兄弟

translation.en: Jeff, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 杰夫 我真对不起

translation.en: Yeah, I know, son. You did your best, but, uh,
translation.zh: 我知道 孩子 你尽力了 但是…

translation.en: fathers can be… stubborn sometimes.
translation.zh: 做父亲的有时会… 非常固执

translation.en: Mary, no further calls.
translation.zh: 玛丽 不要再接电话了

translation.en: You take care of yourself.
translation.zh: 你照顾好自己

translation.en: Jeff… look, if there's anything I can do…
translation.zh: 杰夫… 听我说 如果有什么我能做的…

translation.en: Uh, keep working on that spin ball.
translation.zh: 继续练习旋转球

translation.en: Stay, uh, above the batter's eyeline.
translation.zh: 保持在击球手的视线上方

translation.en: Okay? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay? -All right.
translation.zh: -好吗？-好的

translation.en: I'll see you around, mate.
translation.zh: 回头见 兄弟

translation.en: [Jeff] She would have been proud of you, you know?
translation.zh: 她肯定会为你感到骄傲的

translation.en: I don't know about that.
translation.zh: 这我可不确定

translation.en: Haven't exactly done the best job in keeping this place going.
translation.zh: 我并没做到维持这家公司的运营

translation.en: You know your mother's saying,
translation.zh: 你知道你妈妈生前常说

translation.en: "If you want something done, you do it yourself."
translation.zh: “自己动手 丰衣足食”

translation.en: Well, that's about having the strength to stand up
translation.zh: 核心要义就是在看到需要做的事情时

translation.en: when you see something that needs doing.
translation.zh: 有挺身而出的力量

translation.en: It's about taking action.
translation.zh: 核心要义在于采取行动

translation.en: But that doesn't mean that it's your job to fix everything by yourself.
translation.zh: 但这并不是说所有问题都要由你来扛

translation.en: -Oh, she loved this place. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -她很爱这个地方-是啊

translation.en: But the last thing she would have wanted was for it to become a burden for you.
translation.zh: 但她最不愿意的就是让这里变成你的负担

translation.en: What she wanted
translation.zh: 她最想要的

translation.en: more than anything else was for you to be happy.
translation.zh: 莫过于让你开心

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -I really miss her, Dad. [sniffles] -I know, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 爸 我真的很想她 我知道 宝贝

translation.en: So do I.
translation.zh: 我也想她

translation.en: [Nikki] Oh, man, ITCM's gonna
translation.zh: 天啊 要想卖掉这架老飞机ITCM可有得受了

translation.en: have a hell of a hard time trying to sell this old girl.
translation.zh: 要想卖掉这架老飞机ITCM可有得受了

translation.en: Think I could just chuck 20 bucks and keep it?
translation.zh: 你们觉得我可以出20澳币把它留下吗？

translation.en: To hell with that. You keep it, love. Give it a good home.
translation.zh: 见鬼去吧 你留着吧 亲 给它一个好家庭

translation.en: You know she's just gonna disassemble it for parts within ten minutes, right?
translation.zh: 她会在十分钟内把它拆成零件这你是知道的吧？

translation.en: Still, better than lining the pockets of those greedy bastards across the pond.
translation.zh: 总比喂那些贪婪的英国混蛋的钱包强

translation.en: [Nikki] Oh, no. [in British accent] Mr. Darcy's tablet is broken.
translation.zh: 不好 英国佬的平板坏掉了

translation.en: Perhaps he'll have to ask Papa for a new one.
translation.zh: 也许他得向爸爸要一个新的了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I'm being a bit harsh on him, you reckon?
translation.zh: 你觉得我对他有点太苛刻吗？

translation.en: [Dana] Doesn't matter. The damage is done.
translation.zh: 无所谓了 伤害已经造成了

translation.en: I think he meant well.
translation.zh: 我觉得他是好意

translation.en: I just feel like surely he knows some way
translation.zh: 我只是觉得他应该有办法

translation.en: to sweeten the deal with his old man, you know? Surely.
translation.zh: 让他爸相信保住我们的好处更大 应该有办法

translation.en: If my dad had a private equity firm… [exclaims]
translation.zh: 如果我爸爸有一家私募公司…

translation.en: Tell you what, there'd be no more duct tape engineering.
translation.zh: 我跟你们说就再也不会有“胶带工程”了

translation.en: It'd all be world class, baby. Just state of the art.
translation.zh: 全都会是世界领先水准 最先进的

translation.en: -Wait. What'd you say? -State of the art?
translation.zh: 等等 你说什么？ 最先进的？

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 就是这个

translation.en: Yeah. Tell me about it.
translation.zh: 是啊 可不嘛

translation.en: No, I mean it. That's it.
translation.zh: 不 我是认真的 就是这样

translation.en: No, you've lost me completely.
translation.zh: 不 我没听懂你的话

translation.en: Dad, I have an idea. Hear me out.
translation.zh: 爸 我有主意了 听我说完

translation.en: Sure you're okay to go alone?
translation.zh: 你一个人去可以吗？

translation.en: Don't worry, I'll be fine.
translation.zh: 别担心 我会没事的

translation.en: Just keep everything together until I get back.
translation.zh: 等我回来之前 把一切都保存好

translation.en: Oh, and do me a favor. Radio ahead, get me a place to set down in Brissy.
translation.zh: 帮我一个忙 跟前方沟通一下帮我在布里斯班找个着陆地

translation.en: Need to keep the old girl around for a few days.
translation.zh: 需要让它待几天

translation.en: All right. You got it. And, D, your mom would be so proud.
translation.zh: 好的 没问题 还有 戴娜… 你妈妈会为你感到骄傲的

translation.en: You really think this is gonna work?
translation.zh: 你真觉得能奏效吗？

translation.en: It's our only shot.
translation.zh: 这是我们唯一的机会

translation.en: [woman] Ladies and gentlemen, please remain seated with your seatbelts fastened.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们请待在座位上 并系好安全带

translation.en: [Duncan] Thank you, Marcus. Now, for our final order of business,
translation.zh: 谢谢 马库斯 现在 我们要谈的议题

translation.en: I'd like to discuss a particularly noteworthy development
translation.zh: 我想讨论一下欧洲航天局实验室团队的一个

translation.en: from the lab team over at ESA. Mary, would you please show--
translation.zh: 特别值得关注的进展 -玛丽 你能展示一下…-十分抱歉 先生

translation.en: [Mary] I'm sorry, sir. I'm afraid there's someone--
translation.zh: -玛丽 你能展示一下…-十分抱歉 先生 恐怕有人来…

translation.en: -[woman] Excuse me? -G'day.
translation.zh: 恐怕有人来… 日安

translation.en: -Hi, Will. -Dana.
translation.zh: -嗨 威尔-戴娜

translation.en: I'm sorry, who are you?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你是谁？

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来这里干什么？

translation.en: I didn't think I'd ever see you again.
translation.zh: 我以为再也见不到你了

translation.en: Well, I need to speak to your old man.
translation.zh: 我得跟你老爸聊聊

translation.en: William, what is the meaning of this? Who is this woman?
translation.zh: 威廉 这是什么意思？这女人是谁？

translation.en: Mr. Mitchell. Hi.
translation.zh: 米切尔先生 嗨

translation.en: Uh, ladies and gentlemen of the board…
translation.zh: 董事会的女士们先生们…

translation.en: Yep. Well, my name is Dana Randall.
translation.zh: 对了 我叫戴娜·兰德尔

translation.en: I'm the chief pilot at Fullerton Airways, a small Australian airline,
translation.zh: 我是富勒顿航空公司的首席飞行员我们是澳大利亚的一家小航司

translation.en: which you terminated a few days ago.
translation.zh: 也就是你们几天前关停的那个

translation.en: William, sit down.
translation.zh: 威廉 坐下

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [Duncan] Miss Randall, this is highly irregular.
translation.zh: 兰德尔女士 这太不合常规了

translation.en: -You'll need to leave. -If you give me five minutes--
translation.zh: -你必须离场-如果能给我五分钟的话…

translation.en: -Mary, will you please call-- -Dad, Dad.
translation.zh: -玛丽 请你打电话给…-爸

translation.en: Let's hear her out.
translation.zh: 我们听她说完吧

translation.en: Two minutes.
translation.zh: 给你两分钟

translation.en: This had better be good.
translation.zh: 最好能打动我们

translation.en: Well, Fullerton Airways is a tiny operation
translation.zh: 好的 富勒顿航空公司是位于地球另一端的

translation.en: on the other side of the world.
translation.zh: 一家小航司

translation.en: But what you won't believe
translation.zh: 但你们不会相信的是

translation.en: is that we actually have something in common.
translation.zh: 我们其实有共同点

translation.en: You see, we're both family businesses.
translation.zh: 我们都是家族企业

translation.en: My mum and dad started ours when I was little and,
translation.zh: 这家公司是我小时候我父母创立的

translation.en: well, I promised myself that I would always protect it,
translation.zh: 我曾发誓要一直保护它

translation.en: always keep it just the way that they made it.
translation.zh: 永远保持公司的创立初衷

translation.en: The way that I always remembered it.
translation.zh: 也就是它在我心中一直以来的样子

translation.en: You know what happened? I killed it.
translation.zh: 知道后来怎样了吗？ 我亲手毁了它

translation.en: I think it might be better--
translation.zh: 我觉得最好还是…

translation.en: I killed it because I didn't want anything to change.
translation.zh: 我毁了它 因为我不想有任何改变

translation.en: You know, and sometimes we do need to accept
translation.zh: 有时候 我们的确需要接受

translation.en: that the best way forward is to chart a different course.
translation.zh: 要想向前迈进 就必须制定新的航线

translation.en: Look I came here today with a proposal.
translation.zh: 我今天是带着提案来的

translation.en: We cannot stand still any longer.
translation.zh: 我们不能再原地踏步了

translation.en: The only way for Fullerton Airways to survive is to expand.
translation.zh: 富勒顿航空公司要想生存唯一的途径就是扩张

translation.en: We need to bring in more pilots, more planes.
translation.zh: 我们需要引入更多的飞行员更多的飞机

translation.en: Here you go. This is yours. It's time to take the next step.
translation.zh: 给 这是给您的 是时候迈出下一步了

translation.en: In order to do that, we are going to need a new injection of capital.
translation.zh: 为了实现这一点 我们会需要引入新的资金

translation.en: Now, with your support, we'll be able to increase the coverage,
translation.zh: 有了各位的支持我们就能扩大航司的业务覆盖率

translation.en: almost triple the output within two years.
translation.zh: 在两年内将业务量增加近两倍

translation.en: We can take Fullerton Airways
translation.zh: 我们可以将富勒顿航空公司

translation.en: from a struggling family operation to a thriving business,
translation.zh: 从一家深陷困境的家族航司转变为蒸蒸日上的企业

translation.en: one that continues to serve the community in meaningful and essential ways.
translation.zh: 而且还能以有意义、很重要的方式继续服务整个社区

translation.en: So, I mean, what do you think?
translation.zh: 所以 您意下如何？

translation.en: I think this has gone on long enough.
translation.zh: 我觉得已经说得够久了

translation.en: Miss Randall, this is absurd. I'm familiar with your situation.
translation.zh: 兰德尔女士 这太荒谬了我了解你们的情况

translation.en: Do you honestly expect us to throw more money into this disaster?
translation.zh: 你真指望我们会再往这烂摊子里投钱吗？

translation.en: There's no indication you'll be able to manage something like this.
translation.zh: 没有证据表明你能经营好这么大规模的公司

translation.en: What if they had a more experienced financial officer?
translation.zh: 假如他们有一位更有经验的财务官呢？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Dad…
translation.zh: 爸…

translation.en: I'm resigning. Effective immediately.
translation.zh: 我要辞职 立刻生效

translation.en: I, uh… I'm gonna go and work for Fullerton Airways.
translation.zh: 我要为富勒顿航空公司效力

translation.en: If they'll have me.
translation.zh: 前提是他们要我

translation.en: You must be joking.
translation.zh: 你肯定是在开玩笑

translation.en: No, I'm… I'm not.
translation.zh: 不 我…没有开玩笑

translation.en: But if you give me a chance to get this business on their feet,
translation.zh: 但如果你给我一个机会让这家企业重振旗鼓

translation.en: I will show you that they do have legs.
translation.zh: 我会向你证明 他们确实很有前景

translation.en: Don't be ridiculous.
translation.zh: 别荒唐了

translation.en: I mean, why in heaven's name would you want to throw away a career?
translation.zh: 你为什么要抛弃自己的前途？

translation.en: Dad, you built this business. This was your dream.
translation.zh: 爸… 这家公司是你创建的这是你当年的梦想

translation.en: Don't you remember how that felt?
translation.zh: 你忘了当时的感受了吗？

translation.en: To believe in something so badly that you had to see it done?
translation.zh: 那种对某件事情抱有强烈的信念非看到它实现不可的感觉

translation.en: But, William--
translation.zh: -但是 威廉…-听我说 我…

translation.en: Look, I… I only came here because I wanted to make you proud.
translation.zh: -但是 威廉…-听我说 我… 我来这里上班只是想让你感到骄傲

translation.en: I still want that.
translation.zh: 我仍然想让你感到骄傲

translation.en: But I… I don't belong here.
translation.zh: 但是我…我不属于这里

translation.en: I'm just asking you to trust me.
translation.zh: 我只是想请你信任我

translation.en: Trust us.
translation.zh: 信任我们

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 拜托了

translation.en: You really think you can do this?
translation.zh: 你真觉得你们能做成吗？

translation.en: We can.
translation.zh: 我们可以的

translation.en: Together.
translation.zh: 我们一起

translation.en: -Mary. -Yes, sir?
translation.zh: -玛丽-在

translation.en: Send in Simon and the legal team. We have a proposal to review.
translation.zh: 派西蒙和法律团队进来我们有一个提案要评估

translation.en: Shall we?
translation.zh: 开始吧？

translation.en: You sure about this? I mean, it's not going to be easy.
translation.zh: 你确定吗？这可绝非易事啊

translation.en: Well, are you sure you want to have a flying partner?
translation.zh: 你确定想要一个飞行伙伴吗？

translation.en: Something like that.
translation.zh: 差不多吧
